name: qjrwebwinform-frontend
description: QJR Web Winform Frontend - Vue 2 Application

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dirs=['node_modules/.cache','node_modules/@vue/cli-service/.cache','dist','../src/QJRWebWinform.WPF/wwwroot'];dirs.forEach(p=>{try{const fullPath=path.resolve(__dirname,p);if(fs.existsSync(fullPath)){fs.rmSync(fullPath,{recursive:true,force:true});console.log('✓ Cleaned:',p)}else{console.log('⊘ Not found:',p)}}catch(e){console.error('✗ Error cleaning',p,':',e.message)}});console.log('\n清理完成！请运行 npm run build 重新构建。')"
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
